thread.section_title: Humura Resorts - UPDATED 2017 Resort Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel to stay in Kampala
thread.title_full: Nice hotel to stay in Kampala - Review of Humura Resorts, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: corinna563
title: Nice hotel to stay in Kampala
text: Peaceful hotel in Kampala. Raymond was very helpful and prompt with dealing with the booking. The arranged pickup from Entebbe airport was great and a good way to start my visit to Uganda. The room was comfortable and the A/C worked well. Thanks for a very enjoyable visit and I look forward to my next stay at The Humura when next in Kampala.
